subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans led a sprint to the finish and won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia in Montalcino, Italy, moving into second place over all behind Alexandre Vinokourov.
snippet: Cadel Evans led a sprint to the finish and won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia in Montalcino, Italy, moving into second place over all behind Alexandre Vinokourov.
